resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158090</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158090</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3281</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Teacher Challening Students</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lehrer Challening Kursteilnehmer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étudiants de Challening de Professeur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudantes De Challening Do Professor</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Allievi Di Challening Dell'Insegnante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σπουδαστές Challening δασκάλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estudiantes De Challening Del Profesor</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">General findings about weak/LD classes expressed in an article about a new teacher's experience with program for weak and learning disabled high school students, tallks about the problems and the possible strategies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">teaching strategies</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">special needs students</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning disabilities</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Allgemeine Entdeckungen über die weak/LD 
Kategorien ausgedrückt in einem Artikel über die Erfahrung eines 
neuen Lehrers mit Programm für die schwachen und erlernenden 
untauglichen High School Kursteilnehmer, die tallks über die Probleme
und die möglichen Strategien.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résultats généraux au sujet des classes de 
weak/LD exprimées en article concernant d'un nouveau l'expérience 
professeur avec le programme pour les étudiants handicapés faibles 
et apprenants de lycée, les tallks au sujet des problèmes et les 
stratégies possibles.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Findings gerais sobre as classes de weak/LD 
expressadas em um artigo sobre a experiência de um professor novo com
programa para estudantes disabled fracos e aprendendo da High School, 
tallks sobre os problemas e as estratégias possíveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risultati generali circa i codici categoria di 
weak/LD espressi in un articolo su esperienza del nuovo insegnante con
il programma per gli allievi disabled deboli ed imparanti della High 
School, i tallks circa i problemi e le strategie possibili.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γενικά συμπεράσματα για τις αδύνατες/κλάσεις LD που
εκφράζονται σε ένα άρθρο για την εμπειρία ενός νέου δασκάλου με
το πρόγραμμα για τους αδύνατους και μαθαίνοντας με ειδικές 
ανάγκες σπουδαστές γυμνασίου, tallks για τα προβλήματα και τις 
πιθανές στρατηγικές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resultados generales sobre las clases de weak/LD 
expresadas en un artículo acerca de la experiencia de un nuevo 
profesor con el programa para los estudiantes lisiados débiles y que 
aprenden de la High School secundaria, los tallks sobre los problemas 
y las estrategias posibles.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Strategien</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">spezielle Notwendigkeiten Kursteilnehmer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenunfähigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">stratégies d'enseignement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">étudiants spéciaux des besoins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">incapacités d'étude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estratégias ensinando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estudantes especiais das necessidades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">inabilidades de aprendizagem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strategie d'istruzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">allievi speciali di bisogni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">inabilità imparanti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">στρατηγικές διδασκαλίας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ειδικοί σπουδαστές αναγκών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μαθησιακές δυσκολίες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estrategias de enseñanza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estudiantes especiales de las necesidades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">inhabilidades que aprenden</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
